thread.title: Alexant Systems Corp. Offering One Month of Complimentary Managed IT Support for Financial Services Firms with Order of IT Security & IT Cost Reduction Assessment
thread.title_full: Alexant Systems Corp. Offering One Month of Complimentary Managed IT Support for Financial Services Firms with Order of IT Security & IT Cost Reduction Assessment

author: Jim Wyatt
title: Alexant Systems Corp. Offering One Month of Complimentary Managed IT Support for Financial Services Firms with Order of IT Security & IT Cost Reduction Assessment
text:
Alexant Systems Corporation, a provider of managed IT services to local businesses throughout the Alexandria, Virginia area, is pleased to announce that it is offering a complimentary IT Security and IT Cost Reduction Assessment to financial services firms seeking to reduce business risks and costs with managed IT support and cloud solutions. CPAs and investment advisors who take advantage of this limited-time offer also have an opportunity to receive a month of managed IT services for no cost. Both offers, which have certain restrictions, end September 30, 2015. “For those financial services firms looking to reduce business risks and operating costs, now’s the time for them to focus more on running their business,” said Jim Wyatt, President, Alexant. “Our evaluation of their business systems for security, cost and compliance will help each participant better prepare for the future and make life easier.”
Alexant’s complimentary IT Security & IT Cost Reduction Assessment and a month of free managed IT services and support provide financial firms with the opportunity to create a more efficient operation with:
Local maintenance & remote support 24x7 availability & quick response Cloud & backup services Security monitoring Vendor & tool expertise Disaster planning
 Alexant’s assessment and details about its offer for a month of free managed IT services, please visit http://www.alexant.com or call 703.658.0011.
About Alexant Systems Corporation
Alexant is a managed IT services provider (MSP) that offers premium IT support, consulting and business solutions to small and medium businesses throughout the Alexandria, Virginia and the greater Washington, D.C. areas. Some of the company’s most popular business offerings include customized IT solutions and cloud management services, including Office 365 management, application hosting, virtual server hosting and server colocation. The company primarily serves the insurance, medical and financial services industries. Alexant and its IT business solutions, visit the company on the web at http://www.alexant.com . 703.658.0011. Also, to get the latest industry news and trends, go to http://www.alexant.com/blog/ .
